title: Ebert & Roeper - 03.23.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  March 23rd, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0817538/]Drillbit Taylor[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0814130/]The Hammer[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0888693/]Sleepwalking[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0427998/]The Grand[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0796307/]Under the Same Moon[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0478087/]21[/url]
--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0379865/]Leatherheads[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0421073/]Street Kings[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0817538/]Drillbit Taylor[/url]  -  (skip this one) down - (skip this one) down
-- "dreamed up" by John Hughes - co-written by Seth Rogen - produced by Judd Apatow
-- Owen Wilson - Nate Hartley - Troy Gentile - David Dorfman - Leslie Mann

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0814130/]The Hammer[/url]  -  (sweet little LA story) up - (terrific little film) up
-- Adam Carolla - Oswaldo Castillo - Heather Juergensen

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0888693/]Sleepwalking[/url]  -  down - (quietly effecting) up
-- produced by Charlize Theron
-- Charlize Theron - Dennis Hopper - AnnaSophia Robb - Nick Stahl

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0427998/]The Grand[/url]  -  down - down
-- mock documentary
-- Woody Harrelson - Ray Romano - Werner Herzog (?!) - Cheryl Hines - David Cross - Gabe Kaplan (real life poker player) - Chris Parnell - Estelle Harris - Richard Kind

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0796307/]Under the Same Moon[/url]  -  (moving, despite itself) up - (very well done) up
-- from Mexico
-- Adrian Alonso - Kate del Castillo - America Ferrera

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.amazon.com/Gangsters-Collection-Picture-Snatcher-Brother/dp/B00114XLUU]Warner Gangsters Collection, Vol. 3[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0022403/]Smart Money[/url]  -  1931
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0024450/]Picture Snatcher[/url]  -  1933
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0024314/]The Mayor of Hell[/url]  -  1933
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0024239/]Lady Killer[/url]  -  1933
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0027367/]Black Legion[/url]  -  1937
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0032285/]Brother Orchid[/url]  -  1940

		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0884328/]The Mist[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Mist-Two-Disc-Collectors-Thomas-Jane/dp/B0010X73ZG/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1206391920&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

			-- films of Anthony Minghella
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116209/]The English Patient[/url]  -  1996  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/English-Patient-Miramax-Collectors/dp/B0001WTWCO/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1206392288&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443456/]Breaking and Entering[/url]  -  2006  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Breaking-Entering-Jude-Law/dp/B000N4SHOO/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1206392319&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103129/]Truly Madly Deeply[/url]  -  1990  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_ss_d/002-2166260-8753669?url=search-alias%3Ddvd&field-keywords=truly+madly+deeply&x=0&y=0](amazon)[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0134119/]The Talented Mr. Ripley[/url]  -  1999  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Talented-Mr-Ripley-Matt-Damon/dp/0792165020/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1206392370&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0477139/]Wristcutters: A Love Story[/url]  -  (happy thumbs) up - (original thumbs) up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0419887/]The Kite Runner[/url]  -  (close) down - (powerful story) up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0484562/]The Seeker[/url]  -  down - (no no no) down

	---Phillips&#039; Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0814130/]The Hammer[/url]  -  (sweet little LA story) up - (terrific little film) up
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0200465/]The Bank Job[/url]  -  (big thumbs) up - (big thumbs) up
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0970468/]Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day[/url]  -  up - up

-------------------------------------------------
